Class TrackerInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesharing.core.client.TrackerInformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrackerResponseProcessor

    public class TrackerInformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrackerResponseProcessor
    Represents information to connect to a tracker
